Pre-Game Insights: In their last 5 games, Afghanistan have won 2 games and lost 3. In their last 5 games, Zimbabwe have won 2 games and lost 3.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitch at the Harare Sports Club, Harare is a balanced pitch. The average 1st innings score at this venue in the last 5 matches is 159 runs.
Others: Both teams last played against each other in the Match 9 of the ICC World Twenty20, 2016 where Tinashe Panyangara scored the highest fantasy points for Zimbabwe with 100 match fantasy points while Mohammad Nabi topped the fantasy points leaderboard for Afghanistan with 103 match fantasy points.
